paragraph.heading: 2Compiling

list.item: Select Use existing Ace (control file) and click OK.

Choose the directory where the project will be compiled, by default the same directory containing the Ace file. If you select another directory than the default one, please copy icons (*.ico) and resource files (*.rc) from the default directory (the one containing the Ace file) to the new one.

paragraph.heading: 2Running
paragraph.paragraph: After launching the program, a window will be displayed as shown above. By manipulating the header control, you will see notification of the events that occur displayed in the ../../reference/controls/WEL_LIST_VIEW_chart.xmlWEL_LIST_VIEW situated below.
paragraph.heading: 2Under the Hood
paragraph.paragraph: HEADER_CONTROL inherits ../../reference/controls/WEL_HEADER_CONTROL_chart.xmlWEL_HEADER_CONTROL and redefines many of the `on_' notification features to display the output.

This sample contains the following classes:
APPLICATION_IDS
HEADER_CONTROL
HEADER_CONTROL_DEMO
MAIN_WINDOW
